title: Hammad Azhar briefs PM on ongoing energy sector reforms
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 11 (APP): Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar Saturday met Prime Minister Imran Khan and briefed him in detail on the energy sector.
He also apprised the prime minister of the ongoing reforms in the energy sector.
Moreover, they also discussed the matters pertaining to the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf.
